column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH------: There was shock and surprise at 4:30 pm on January 21
column8: when a tuk-tuk carrying the body of a man stopped and dumped the corpse in front of a residential home. The driver then left the scene.------UPDATE: The manâ€™s wife who was him and put his body on the street from the tuk tuk returned shortly after. The couple were known as poor scavengers and heavy drinkers. Police then removed the body and and took it to the pagoda.------ ------AREY
